subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Lincoln Landis has a story to tell. It is from 76 years ago, back when he was 10 and he sat in a front-row seat for a World Series game at Wrigley Field.
snippet: Lincoln Landis has a story to tell. It is from 76 years ago, back when he was 10 and he sat in a front-row seat for a World Series game at Wrigley Field.
